channel.title: [FIXED] Changing Godsword Emotes? [FIXED] [Help¿] Darkbow Doesn't Range [Help?]
channel.description:
[s]Hey everyone, again.
I was wondering, what do I have to do in order to change my Godsword Attack emotes? Atm, most of my weapons, including gs', use the "Throwing Dart" emote; somewhat like punching.
I was wondering where I can change this, as I'd rather have my own gs emote (lol found a good one) than just "punching".
And is there a way to change the default emote?[/s]
_____________________________________________________________________
My darkbow doesn't like, RANGE. You'd have to be next to the person in order for it to work, which gets annoying. My Crystal bow ranges from a little bit away, which is alright. I was wondering what file I can make my Darkbow actually RANGE from, would be.
_________________
Any assistance is appreciated.

item.title: [FIXED] Changing Godsword Emotes? [FIXED] [Help¿] Darkbow Doesn't Range [Help?]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

setAnimation(GetWepAnim()); if(id == 15333)//Godsword { return 2876; } } else { } if(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) { if(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX != absX && server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY != absY) viewTo(server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX, server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY); faceNPC = 32768+AttackingOn; faceNPCupdate = true; } } } break;

That’s the client.java code for the anim.

I get these errors when compiling:

client.java:19291: cannot find symbol symbol : variable id location: class client if(id == 15333)//Godsword ^ client.java:19293: cannot return a vlue from method whose result type is void return 2876; ^ 2 errors You have successfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .

How did I successfully compile when I got 2 errors >.<’’[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2009, 02:18:37 pm[/size][hr]I can log into my server with those errors, but nothing changes. I just want my Godswords to use emote 2876 when I attack! Is that too much to ask… >.<"[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 31, 2009, 04:02:56 pm[/size][hr]Alright, fixed the emote problem.

Now I need help with darkbow…

Read full topic

item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

To change the emotes of your weapons search

GetWepAnim

And make a code like this

if(id == ID)//Godsword { return EMOTE NUMBER; )

and then look where it says like animation and edit the id next to animation and yea…
